title: (x) 3 trendy display fonts - Basix, Oeiller, custom by M/M Paris {Dav}
content:
These 3 fonts look like something by Lineto, but i couldn’t find a math in their website. I’m sure someone will identify them in here.  
Thanks in advance for the feedback.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=font1.jpg) | 114.77 KB |
| [font2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=font2.jpg) | 58.92 KB |
| [font3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=font3.jpg) | 77.95 KB |
author: arena

comments.content:
‘font1.jpg’ = ‘ [Basix](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528001136/http:/www.t26.com/fonts/display.php?f_id=170&dw=270)’, by David Weik / T.26..  
‘font2.jpg’ = ‘ [Oeiller](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528001136/http:/www.t26.com/fonts/display.php?f_id=397)’, by Julien Janiszewski / T.26..  
‘font3.jpg’ = Björk = Custom typography, by Mathias Augustyniak + Michael Amzalag / [M/M Paris](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528001136/http:/www.mmparis.com/)..
